## Config.MaxShapeOrImageWidthOrHeight property

设置/获取形状/图像的最大宽度或高度，GridJs将忽略宽度或高度大于此的形状/图像，当IslimitShapes=true

```csharp
public static int MaxShapeOrImageWidthOrHeight { get; set; }
```
